page.title: 05Clubs 2
page.content:
Glinton Utd F.C Glinton United Football Club practice every Wednesday.They play their games normaly on a Saturday but sometimes play on Wednesdays.Glinton have two football teams,Glinton Utd(1stteam)&Glinton Utd(reserves) .They play in the Peterborough League.
Tennis club The Tennis club plays at the Secondry school.MRS.Dowty is the teacher.They play on 4 courts which are made of concrete
Bowling Club The Glinton Bowling Club play in the local Village Hall.They play Indoor Bowls on a substitute green mat.This mat is about 15 meters in length.
